content: crochet this super handy and lovely yarn bowl better than any wood or ceramic yarn bowl and even if you drop it on the floor it will never break it s an unbreakable yarn bowl neat huh and what s even better you will have made it yourself perhaps it might even make a superb gift for a crocheter or knitter so go get your pure wool yarn and let s get started materials yarn jette 2 skein for the smaller bowl and 3 5 for the bigger one hook 8 0mm button 20mm for the smaller bowl and 25mm for the bigger one scissor needle with a big eye washing machine tips & help in the end of the pattern you will find a number of pictures to help guide you these pictures apply for both the smaller and bigger yarnbowl the looser you crochet the harder your bowl will felt in the washing machine
